long_description: Harkening back to the early days of Patagonia, the 26L Arbor Daypack looks sporty and simple yet has modern features like a padded laptop sleeve. Recycled-polyester fabric is treated with a polyurethane coating and durable water repellent finish. Generous main compartment holds larger items like a jacket, while a zippered pocket under the top lid secures a wallet, snacks, etc. Padded laptop sleeve holds up to a 15 in. laptop and is raised up off the pack bottom to protect contents. The padded laptop sleeve doubles as an insulated hydration reservoir complete with tube port. Ergonomic shoulder straps and an adjustable sternum strap make the 26-liter Patagonia Arbor Daypack comfortable to carry.
short_description: Harkening back to the early days of Patagonia, the 26L Arbor Daypack looks sporty and simple yet has modern features like a padded laptop sleeve.
